column1: S0112.CARD.  1. CARD ONE
S0112.DECK.  112. SURVEY NUMBER
S0112.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.

S0112.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR RANK OR GRAD?  1. PRIVATE OR PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 2. CORPORAL OR TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE 3. SERGEANT OR TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE 4. STAFF SERGEANT OR TECHNICIAN 3RD GRADE 5. TECHNICAL SERGEANT, MASTER SERGEANT, OR FIRST SERGEANT 0. NO ANSWER
S0112.Q2. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDA?  1. 24 YEARS OR LESS 2. 25 TO 29 YEARS 3. 30 TO 34 YEARS 4. 35 YEARS OR MORE 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0112.Q3. ARE YOU:  1. SINGLE 2. MARRIED BEFORE JOINING ARMY 3. MARRIED AFTER JOINING ARMY 4. WIDOWED, DIVORCED OR SEPARATED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0112.Q4. CHECK THE ANSWER THAT TELLS BEST HOW FAR YOU WENT IN SCHOOL:  1. DID NOT FINISH GRADE SCHOOL 2. FINISHED GRADE SCHOOL 3. HAD SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT GRADUATE 4. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 5. HAD SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT GRADUATE 6. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER

S0112.Q5. ABOUT HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARM?  1. LESS THAN SIX MONTHS 2. SIX MONTHS TO ONE YEAR 3. ONE YEAR TO 18 MONTHS 4. EIGHTEEN MONTHS TO TWO YEARS 5. OVER TWO YEARS 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0112.Q6. ABOUT HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE BRITISH ISLE?  1. THREE MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER THREE MONTHS BUT NOT OVER SIX MONTHS 3. SIX MONTHS TO ONE YEAR 4. ONE YEAR TO EIGHTEEN MONTHS 5. OVER EIGHTEEN MONTHS 0. NO ANSWER
S0112.Q7. ON THE WHOLE HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE ARM?  1. I LIKE THE ARMY VERY MUCH 2. I LIKE IT FAIRLY WELL 3. I RATHER DISLIKE IT 4. I DISLIKE THE ARMY VERY MUCH 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0112.Q8. DO YOU THINK YOU MIGHT WANT TO STAY IN THE ARMY AFTER THE WA?  1. YES, I WOULD WANT TO VERY MUCH 2. YES, I MIGHT WANT TO, BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. NO, I DON'T THINK I WOULD WANT TO 4. NO, I WOULD NOT WANT TO AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0112.Q9. ON THE WHOLE, DO YOU THINK THE ARMY IS GIVING YOU A CHANCE TO SHOW WHAT YOU CAN D?  1. A VERY GOOD CHANCE 2. A FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE 3. NOT MUCH OF A CHANCE 4. NO CHANCE AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0112.Q10. DO YOU FEEL PROUD OF YOUR COMPAN?  1. YES, VERY PROUD 2. YES, FAIRLY PROUD 3. NO, NOT VERY PROUD 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0112.Q11. HOW WELL HAVE YOU BEEN ABLE TO FIT YOURSELF INTO ARMY LIF?  1. VERY WELL ON THE WHOLE 2. PRETTY WELL ON THE WHOLE 3. FIT IN MORE OR LESS 4. NOT WELL ON THE WHOLE 5. HAVEN'T BEEN ABLE TO FIT INTO ARMY LIFE AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S0112.Q12. WHEN YOU ARE ON YOUR JOB, HOW ENTHUSIASTIC DO YOU USUALLY FEEL ABOUT WHAT YOU ARE DOIN?  1. VERY ENTHUSIASTIC 2. FAIRLY ENTHUSIASTIC 3. NOT VERY ENTHUSIASTIC 4. HAVE NO ENTHUSIASM AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S0112.Q13. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING WOULD YOU SAY BEST APPLIES TO YOUR JO?  1. TIME ALWAYS PASSES QUICKLY 2. TIME PASSES QUICKLY MOST OF THE TIME 3. ENJOY WORKING PART OF THE TIME BUT IT DRAGS AT OTHER TIMES 4. TIME DRAGS MOST OF THE TIME 5. TIME ALWAYS DRAGS 0. NO ANSWER
S0112.Q14. ON THE WHOLE, HOW IS THE MORALE OF THE MEN IN YOUR COMPAN?  1. VERY HIGH 2. FAIRLY HIGH 3. JUST SO-SO 4. FAIRLY LOW 5. VERY LOW 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0112.Q15. ABOUT HOW MUCH OF THE TIME DO YOU HAVE WORK ENOUGH TO KEEP YOU BUS?  1. WE ARE ALWAYS BUSY 2. WE ARE BUSY MOST OF THE TIME BUT NOT ALWAYS 3. BUSY ABOUT HALF THE TIME 4. BUSY LESS THAN HALF THE TIME 5. RARELY EVER BUSY 0. NO ANSWER

S0112.Q16. IN GENERAL, HOW WOULD YOU SAY YOU FEEL MOST OF THE TIME, IN GOOD SPIRITS OR IN LOW SPIRIT?  1. I AM USUALLY IN GOOD SPIRITS 2. I AM IN GOOD SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME AND IN LOW SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME 3. I AM USUALLY IN LOW SPIRITS 0. NO ANSWER
S0112.Q17. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOU REALLY BELONG IN YOUR COMPANY AND ARE AN IMPORTANT PART OF I?  1. VERY MUCH SO 2. FAIRLY MUCH SO 3. NOT VERY MUCH 4. NOT AT ALL 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0112.Q18. WHAT SORT OF TEAMWORK AND COOPERATION DO THE MEN IN YOUR COMPANY HAVE ON THE JO?  1. VERY GOOD 2. FAIRLY GOOD 3. NOT VERY GOOD 4. NOT GOOD AT ALL 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0112.Q19. IF YOU ARE ORDERED TO DO SOMETHING AND NOT TOLD THE REASON WHY, HOW DO YOU FEE?  1. I OBEY CHEERFULLY ALWAYS 2. I OBEY BUT NEVER LIKE IT 3. I OBEY CHEERFULLY, PROVIDED I FEEL THERE IS A GOOD PURPOSE IN NOT TELLING THE REASON WHY, - OTHERWISE I OBEY BUT DON'T LIKE IT 4. I TRY TO GET OUT OF DOING IT IF I CAN 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0112.Q20. HOW IMPORTANT A PART DO YOU THINK YOUR COMPANY WILL PLAY IN WINNING THE WA?  1. A VERY IMPORTANT PART 2. A FAIRLY IMPORTANT PART 3. NOT A VERY IMPORTANT PART 4. NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0112.Q21. HOW SUCCESSFUL ARE YOUR OFFICERS IN GETTING WILLING AND WHOLEHEARTED COOPERATION FROM THE ME?  1. VERY SUCCESSFUL 2. FAIRLY SUCCESSFUL 3. NOT VERY SUCCESSFUL 4. UNSUCCESSFUL 5. NOT SURE 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0112.Q22. HOW SUCCESSFUL ARE YOUR NONCOMS IN GETTING WILLING AND WHOLEHEARTED COOPERATION FROM THE ME?  1. VERY SUCCESSFUL 2. FAIRLY SUCCESSFUL 3. NOT VERY SUCCESSFUL 4. UNSUCCESSFUL 5. NOT SURE 0. NO ANSWER
S0112.Q23. DO YOU USUALLY FEEL THAT WHAT YOU ARE DOING IN THE ARMY IS WORTHWHILE OR NO?  1. I USUALLY FEEL IT IS NOT WORTHWHILE 2. I USUALLY FEEL IT IS WORTHWHILE 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0112.Q24. DO YOU EVER FEEL THAT YOU ARE NOT AS GOOD A SOLDIER AS MOST OF THE OTHER MEN IN YOUR OUTFI?  1. I FEEL THAT WAY NEARLY ALL OF THE TIME 2. I FEEL THAT WAY FAIRLY OFTEN 3. I FEEL THAT WAY ONLY ONCE IN A WHILE 4. I ALMOST NEVER FEEL THAT WAY 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0112.Q25. WHICH COMES CLOSEST TO YOUR IDEA OF HOW HARD IT IS GOING TO BE TO BEAT THE GERMAN?  1. IT WILL NOT BE VERY HARD 2. IT WILL BE A TOUGH JOB BUT OUR LOSSES WON'T BE TOO HEAVY 3. IT WILL BE A TOUGH JOB, WITH HEAVY LOSSES OF MEN AND EQUIPMENT 0. NO ANSWER

S0112.Q26. DO YOU THINK THE EQUIPMENT OF THE AMERICAN ARMY IS BETTER OR WORSE THAN THE EQUIPMENT OF THE GERMAN ARM?  1. ALL OF OUR EQUIPMENT IS BETTER 2. MOST OF OUR EQUIPMENT IS BETTER 3. OUR EQUIPMENT IS ABOUT THE SAME AS THAT OF THE GERMAN ARMY 4. MOST OF OUR EQUIPMENT IS WORSE 5. ALL OF OUR EQUIPMENT IS WORSE 6. DON'T KNOW 7. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0112.Q27. HOW MUCH DO THE THINGS THAT THIS WAR IS BEING FOUGHT OVER MEAN TO YOU PERSONALL?  1. THEY MEAN EVERYTHING TO ME 2. THEY MEAN QUITE A BIT TO ME 3. THEY DON'T MEAN VERY MUCH TO ME 4. NOT SURE WHETHER THEY MEAN ANYTHING TO ME OR NOT 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0112.Q28. HOW MUCH CHANCE DO YOU FEEL THERE IS THAT AFTER THE WAR THINGS WILL BE WORKED OUT PRETTY MUCH TO THE BEST INTERESTS OF THE MOST PEOPL?  1. A VERY GOOD CHANCE 2. A FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE 3. NOT A VERY GOOD CHANCE 4. NO CHANCE AT ALL 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0112.Q29. IN GENERAL, HOW WELL DO YOU LIKE WORKING IN YOUR PRESENT ARMY JO?  1. I REALLY ENJOY MY WORK VERY MUCH 2. I LIKE IT FAIRLY WELL 3. I DISLIKE IT A LITTLE 4. I DISLIKE IT VERY MUCH 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0112.Q30. WOULD YOU SAY THAT MOST OF THE MEN IN YOUR COMPANY USUALLY PUT ALL THAT THEY HAVE INTO THEIR REGULAR DUTIES, OR DO THEY USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET B?  1. MOST OF THE MEN USUALLY PUT ALL THAT THEY HAVE INTO IT 2. MOST OF THE MEN USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0112.Q31. HOW ABOUT YOURSELF - WOULD YOU HONESTLY SAY THAT YOU USUALLY PUT ALL YOU HAVE INTO YOUR REGULAR DUTIES, OR DO YOU USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET B?  1. I USUALLY PUT ALL I HAVE INTO IT 2. I USUALY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0112.Q32. HOW MUCH PRIDE DO MOST OF THE MEN IN YOUR COMPANY TAKE IN THE WAY THEY HANDLE THEIR JOB OR ASSIGNMEN?  1. A GREAT DEAL OF PRIDE 2. QUITE A BIT 3. NOT VERY MUCH 4. ALMOST NO PRIDE AT ALL 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0112.Q33. HOW SATISFIED ARE YOU ABOUT BEING IN YOUR PRESENT ARMY JOB INSTEAD OF SOME OTHER ARMY JO?  1. VERY SATISFIED 2. SATISFIED 3. IT DOES NOT MAKE ANY DIFFERENCE TO ME 4. SOMEWHAT DISSATISFIED 5. VERY MUCH DISSATISFIED 0. NO ANSWER

S0112.Q34. HOW MUCH EFFORT DO YOU FEEL HAS BEEN MADE TO PLACE YOU IN THE KIND OF ARMY JOB WHERE YOU CAN FIT IN BEST AND BE OF MOST VALU?  1. EVERY POSSIBLE EFFORT WAS MADE 2. A REASONABLE EFFORT WAS MADE 3. SOME EFFORT, BUT NOT MUCH 4. NO EFFORT WAS MADE AT ALL 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0112.Q35. DO YOU FEEL YOUR OFFICERS KNOW WHAT YOUR ABILITIES ARE AND WHAT YOU ARE ABLE TO D?  1. THEY HAVE A GOOD IDEA 2. THEY HAVE A FAIR IDEA 3. THEY KNOW LITTLE OR NOTHING ABOUT MY ABILITIES 0. NO ANSWER

S0112.Q36. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOUR NONCOMS KNOW WHAT YOUR ABILITIES ARE AND WHAT YOU ARE ABLE TO D?  1. THEY HAVE A GOOD IDEA 2. THEY HAVE A FAIR IDEA 3. THEY KNOW LITTLE OR NOTHING ABOUT MY ABILITIES 0. NO ANSWER

S0112.Q37. DO YOU THINK THAT MOST OF THE MEN IN YOUR COMPANY WOULD "GO TO BAT" FOR THEIR NONCOM?  1. YES, THEY WOULD DO MOST ANYTHING FOR THEM 2. YES, THEY WOULD PROBABLY "GO TO BAT" FOR THEM 3. I DOUBT IF THEY WOULD 4. I AM PRETTY SURE THEY WOULD NOT 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0112.Q38. DO YOU THINK THAT MOST OF THE MEN IN YOUR COMPANY WOULD "GO TO BAT" FOR THEIR OFFICER?  1. YES, THEY WOULD DO MOST ANYTHING FOR THEM 2. YES, THEY WOULD PROBABLY "GO TO BAT" FOR THEM 3. I DOUBT IF THEY WOULD 4. I AM PRETTY SURE THEY WOULD NOT 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0112.Q39. DO YOU THINK YOUR OFFICERS ARE INTERESTED IN WHAT YOU THINK AND HOW YOU FEEL ABOUT THING?  1. VERY MUCH INTERESTED 2. FAIRLY INTERESTED 3. SLIGHTLY INTERESTED 4. THEY DON'T SEEM TO CARE ONE WAY OR ANOTHER 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0112.Q40. DO YOU THINK YOUR NON-COMS ARE INTERESTED IN WHAT YOU THINK AND HOW YOU FEEL ABOUT THING?  1. VERY MUCH INTERESTED 2. FAIRLY INTERESTED 3. SLIGHTLY INTERESTED 4. THEY DON'T SEEM TO CARE ONE WAY OR ANOTHER 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0112.Q41. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING STATEMENTS BEST TELLS THE WAY YOU FEEL ABOUT GETTING INTO AN ACTUAL BATTLE ZON?  1. I WANT VERY MUCH TO GET INTO IT JUST AS SOON AS POSSIBLE 2. I'M READY TO GO ANYTIME 3. I'D LIKE TO GO BEFORE IT'S OVER BUT I DON'T THINK I'M READY YET 4. I HOPE I WON'T HAVE TO GO, BUT IF I DO I THINK I'LL DO ALRIGHT 5. I HOPE I WON'T HAVE TO GO BECAUSE I DON'T THINK I WOULD DO VERY WELL 6. NO OPINION 7. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0112.Q42. IF AND WHEN YOU GET INTO COMBAT HOW WELL DO YOU THINK YOU WILL STAND UP UNDER BATTLE CONDITION?  1. VERY WELL 2. FAIRLY WELL 3. NOT VERY WELL 4. NOT WELL AT ALL 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0112.Q43. DO YOU THINK THE MEN IN YOUR PLATOON HAVE BEEN GIVEN ENOUGH TRAINING AND EXPERIENCE SO THAT THEY COULD DO A GOOD JOB OF TAKING CHARGE OF A GROUP OF MEN ON THEIR OWN IN COMBA?  1. MOST OF THEM HAVE BEEN GIVEN ENOUGH TRAINING 2. ABOUT HALF OF THEM HAVE BEEN GIVEN ENOUGH TRAINING 3. FEW OF THEM HAVE BEEN GIVEN ENOUGH TRAINING 0. NO ANSWER

S0112.Q44. HOW ABOUT YOURSELF - DO YOU THINK YOU HAVE BEEN GIVEN ENOUGH TRAINING AND EXPERIENCE SO THAT YOU COULD DO A GOOD JOB OF TAKING CHARGE OF A GROUP OF MEN ON YOUR OWN IN COMBA?  1. HAVE BEEN GIVEN ENOUGH TRAINING AND EXPERIENCE 2. HAVE NOT BEEN GIVEN QUITE ENOUGH TRAINING AND EXPERIENCE 3. HAVE NOT BEEN GIVEN NEARLY ENOUGH TRAINING AND EXPERIENCE 0. NO ANSWER

S0112.Q45. IF YOUR SQUAD OR PLATOON WERE TO GET SEPARATED FROM YOUR OFFICERS IN COMBAT HOW GOOD A JOB DO YOU THINK THE MEN WOULD BE ABLE TO DO IN GOING AHEAD AND CARRYING OUT THEIR MISSIO?  1. A VERY GOOD JOB 2. A FAIRLY GOOD JOB 3. DON'T THINK THEY WOULD DO VERY GOOD 0. NO ANSWER

S0112.Q46A. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOU ARE NOW TRAINED AND READY FOR COMBAT OR DO YOU NEED MORE TRAININ?  1. I'M READY FOR COMBAT NOW 2. I NEED A LITTLE MORE OF SOME KINDS OF TRAINING 3. I NEED A LOT MORE OF SOME KINDS OF TRAINING 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTION 46B NOT CODED.

S0112.Q47. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING BEST DESCRIBED YOUR OWN FEELING ABOUT GETTING INTO COMBAT AGAINST THE GERMAN?  1. I WANT TO GET IN AND AM JUST WAITING FOR THE CHANCE 2. DON'T CARE ABOUT COMBAT, BUT WOULD PREFER IT TO PRESENT SET-UP 3. HOPE I DON'T HAVE TO GET INTO COMBAT 0. NO ANSWER

S0112.Q48. IF YOU WERE GIVEN A SQUAD OF MEN AND TOLD TO TAKE CHARGE OF THEM ALL BY YOURSELF IN A COMBAT MISSION UNDER ENEMY FIRE, HOW WELL DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD D?  1. VERY WELL 2. FAIRLY WELL 3. NOT VERY WELL 0. NO ANSWER

S0112.Q49. HOW MANY OF THE MEN IN YOUR PLATOON DO YOU THINK WOULD DO A GOOD JOB IF THEY WERE GIVEN A SQUAD OF MEN AND TOLD TO TAKE CHARGE OF THEM IN A COMBAT MISSION UNDER ENEMY FIR?  1. ALL OF THEM 2. MOST OF THEM 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM 4. FEW OF THEM 5. NONE OF THEM 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0112.Q50. HOW MANY OF THE OFFICERS IN YOUR COMPANY ARE THE KIND YOU WOULD WANT TO SERVE UNDER IN COMBA?  1. ALL OF THEM ARE 2. MOST OF THEM ARE 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM ARE 4. FEW OF THEM ARE 5. NONE OF THEM ARE 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0112.Q51. HOW MANY OF THE NON-COMS IN YOUR COMPANY ARE THE KIND YOU WOULD WANT TO SERVE UNDER IN COMBA?  1. ALL OF THEM ARE 2. MOST OF THEM ARE 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM ARE 4. FEW OF THEM ARE 5. NONE OF THEM ARE 0. NO ANSWER
S0112.Q52. DO YOU FEEL THE MOST DESERVING MEN USUALLY GET THE BEST "BREAKS" IN YOUR OUTFI?  1. ALWAYS 2. USUALLY 3. ABOUT HALF THE TIME 4. RARELY 5. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

S0112.Q53. WHEN YOU ARE GIVEN A JOB TO DO, ARE YOU TOLD ENOUGH ABOUT IT SO THAT YOU CAN DO A GOOD JO?  1. ALWAYS TOLD ENOUGH 2. USUALLY TOLD ENOUGH 3. OFTEN NOT TOLD ENOUGH 4. ALMOST NEVER TOLD ENOUGH 0. NO ANSWER
S0112.Q54. HOW WELL DO YOU THINK YOUR NON-COMS KNOW THEIR STUF?  1. VERY WELL 2. FAIRLY WELL 3. NOT SO WELL 4. NOT WELL AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S0112.Q55. HOW WELL DO YOU THINK YOUR OFFICERS KNOW THEIR STUF?  1. VERY WELL 2. FAIRLY WELL 3. NOT SO WELL 4. NOT WELL AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S0112.Q56. ARE YOU USUALLY TOLD WHY THE THINGS YOU DO AND THE THINGS THAT ARE DONE IN YOUR OUTFIT ARE NECESSAR?  1. ALMOST ALWAYS 2. USUALLY 3. ABOUT HALF THE TIME 4. USUALLY NOT 0. NO ANSWER

S0112.Q57. HOW EASY DO YOU FEEL IT IS TO GET SUGGESTIONS BROUGHT TO THE ATTENTION OF THOSE IN YOUR COMPANY WHO COULD PUT THEM TO US?  1. VERY EASY 2. QUITE EASY 3. NOT VERY EASY 4. VERY DIFFICULT 5. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
S0112.Q58. WHEN YOU DO A PARTICULARLY GOOD JOB DO YOU USUALLY GET RECOGNITION OR PRAISE FOR I?  1. ALWAYS 2. USUALLY 3. RARELY 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0112.Q59. WHEN A MAN IN YOUR OUTFIT MAKES A GOOD SUGGESTION DOES HE USUALLY GET THE CREDIT HE DESERVE?  1. ALWAYS 2. MOST OF THE TIME 3. ABOUT HALF THE TIME 4. SELDOM 5. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

S0112.Q60. DO TOO MANY OF THE THINGS YOU HAVE TO DO SEEM UNNECESSARY FOR MAKING YOUR OUTFIT A BETTER FIGHTING UNI?  1. ALMOST ALL OF THEM SEEM NECESSARY 2. SOME, BUT NOT TOO MANY, SEEM UNNECESSARY 3. TOO MANY SEEM UNNECESSARY 4. FAR TOO MANY SEEM UNNECESSARY 0. NO ANSWER
S0112.Q61. WHEN PROMOTIONS ARE MADE IN THE COMPANY, HOW OFTEN DO THEY GO TO THE MEN WHO DESERVE THEM MOS?  1. RARELY OR NEVER 2. SOMETIMES 3. ABOUT HALF THE TIME 4. USUALLY 5. ALWAYS 0. NO ANSWER

S0112.Q62. DO YOU THINK THOSE WHO RECOMMEND AND DECIDE ON PROMOTIONS IN YOUR COMPANY REALLY KNOW WHICH MEN ARE BEST QUALIFIED FOR PROMOTIO?  1. THEY KNOW VERY LITTLE ABOUT IT 2. THEY HAVE A FAIRLY GOOD IDEA 3. THEY HAVE A PRETTY GOOD IDEA 4. THEY KNOW PRETTY WELL 0. NO ANSWER

S0112.Q63. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING DO YOU THINK WOULD BE THE BIGGEST HELP IN GETTING A PROMOTION IN YOUR OUTFI?  1. ABILITY ON THE JOB 2. TIME IN THE ARMY 3. HAVING AN "IN" WITH THE RIGHT PEOPLE 4. EDUCATION 5. BEING A CONSCIENTIOUS, HARD WORKER 0. NO ANSWER

S0112.Q64. IN YOUR OUTFIT WHEN A MAN BREAKS A RULE OR DISOBEYS AN ORDER DOES HE USUALLY GET WHAT HE HAS COMING TO HI?  1. HE GETS MUCH MORE THAN HE SHOULD 2. HE GETS SOMEWHAT MORE THAN HE SHOULD 3. HE GETS ABOUT WHAT HE SHOULD 4. HE GETS SOMEWHAT LESS THAN HE SHOULD 5. HE GETS MUCH LESS THAN HE SHOULD 6. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0112.Q65. DO YOU THINK YOUR OFFICERS ARE INTERESTED IN YOUR PERSONAL WELFAR?  1. VERY MUCH INTERESTED 2. FAIRLY INTERESTED 3. SLIGHTLY INTERESTED 4. THEY DON'T SEEM TO CARE ONE WAY OR ANOTHER 0. NO ANSWER

S0112.Q66. DO YOU THINK THAT YOUR NON-COMS ARE INTERESTED IN YOUR PERSONAL WELFAR?  1. VERY MUCH INTERESTED 2. FAIRLY INTERESTED 3. SLIGHTLY INTERESTED 4. THEY DON'T SEEM TO CARE ONE WAY OR ANOTHER 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 67 NOT CODED.
S0112.Q68. WHAT SORT OF OPINION DO YOU HAVE OF THE ENGLISH PEOPL?  1. VERY FAVORABLE 2. FAIRLY FAVORABLE 3. RATHER UNFAVORABLE 4. VERY UNFAVORABLE 0. NO ANSWER
S0112.Q69. WHAT SORT OF OPINION DO YOU HAVE OF THE IRISH PEOPL?  1. VERY FAVORABLE 2. FAIRLY FAVORABLE 3. RATHER UNFAVORABLE 4. VERY UNFAVORABLE 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0112.Q70. AFTER THE WAR DO YOU THINK THAT YOU WILL BE VERY MUCH CONCERNED ABOUT THE MAJOR PROBLEMS THAT FACE GROUPS OF PEOPLE OUTSIDE THE CIRCLE OF YOUR OWN FAMILY AND FRIEND?  1. I WILL NOT BE ESPECIALLY CONCERNED ABOUT SUCH PROBLEMS 2. I WILL PROBABLY HAVE SOME CONCERN ABOUT SUCH PROBLEMS 3. I AM SURE I WILL BE GREATLY CONCERNED ABOUT SUCH PROBLEMS 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0112.Q71. DO YOU THINK OF ANY GROUP OF PEOPLE IN THE U.S. (WHETHER OCCUPATIONAL, RACIAL, OR RELIGIOUS, ETC.) FOR WHOM YOU FEEL A PARTICULAR DISLIK? IF YES, WHAT GROUP OR GROUP?  1. YES 2. NO 3. NO ANSWER 0. UNDESIGNATED X. CODES FOR SPECIFIC GROUPS NOT PROVIDED BY SURVEY ORGANIZATION.

S0112.V79. IDENTIFICATION OF ORGANIZATIONS WITHIN THE FIFTH DIVISION: X. EACH NUMBER IN COLUMN 15 INDICATES A DIFFERENT BATTALION. 1-3 BEING IN THE FIRST REGIMENT, 4-6 IN THE SECOND AND 7-9 IN THE THIRD. THE COMPANIES WITHIN EACH BATTALION ARE NUMBERED 1-4 IN COLUMN 16.  ANP X. CODES NOT PROVIDED BY SURVEY ORGANIZATION. DATA TRANSFERRED AS IS.
S0112.V80. SERIAL NUMBER IDENTIFICATION:  ANP 00.NO CODE OR NO DATA X. CODES NOT PROVIDED BY SURVEY ORGANIZATION. DATA TRANSFERRED AS IS.
